tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had PCOS problem.. was trying for baby from 2 years with different treatments like ovulation induction, natural. But no luck. Later I went through laparoscopic surgery as during my HSG test my both tubes came as blocked. So another doctor suggested to go through surgery and they mentioned one tube is blocked and one is open but hydrosaplnix. Later we visited Dr. B Mallikarjun Keerthi and seeing the reports he practically suggested to go for IVF as chances of naturally conceive is less due to hydrosaplnix tube. So we went for IVF treatment and he explained the process clearly before starting the process. He was very friendly and practically explaining the expected results. After 1st IVF cycle, I got conceived and it was successful. Got the good news after waiting for more than 2 years.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr. Kirthi is one exceptional doctor who never ask you to undergo unnecessary tests. His way of approach to issues are straight and he doesn’t scare u like other doctors. He explains patiently about your health conditions and advices you right. 

I had a little hesitation on how to consult male doctor for infertility problem but after meeting him my perception completely changed. No doubt You will be very comfortable talking to him. He gives u perfect advice at any time. He is one amazing person who is very dedicated to his work. I have positive experience consulting Dr. Kirthi.

Thank u Doctor!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had less sperm count and sperm mobility. I was little fat as well. My wife had PCO problems and had to go minor surgeries for proper intercourse. These were the key issues for conceiving .
Through my sister suggestion we had met Dr. Mallikarjun kirthi. Initially we thought how can we discuss with a male all these issues. Anyways we went ahead and gave a try.
Dr. Kirti style of treatment is very unique, perfect and in systematic way. He addresses problems of both male and female and gives treatment accordingly. He writes each every aspect in the patient history book.
He has loads of patience and experience hich is more important as every husband and wife would like to become a parent. He tells us the key reasons why we are not able to conceive and convinces with very very cool head. Like other doctors and hospitals, he won't put under medication unnecessarily and give extra dosage. 
He understands situation both professionally and personally. He is very friendly and always available irrespective of time. 

Our first treatment of IUI was very much successful and we are now having 7months kid. The moment she conceived literally we had tears. 
Dr. Kirthi was there with us during toughest times.

If you have fertility problems then I suggest Dr. Kirti. Highly recommended

tags: None
review:
Visited for perimenopausal treatment- 
Humble, friendly and very confident doctor . Doesn't prescribe unnecessary medicines. He knows what he does and guides you exactly .Cheerful and full of energy. He will give you frank open suggestions. 

Best thing is he always greets his patients with one sentence- how are you..? and this is like wellness vitamin to the patient. Very well connects with patient's sensitivity. 

Warm regards and respect, 
Veena Bhat.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Keerthi is one gem of a gynecologist who brings in decades of experience across the table.
He brings in positivity and fills so much of confidence, that it's a great source of relief. 
He is truly a personification for the proverb, 'Vaidyo Narayano HariHi' and I would recommend Dr.Keeethi to everyone who's looking for expert advice/ assistance in Gynecology. 
I'll always be thankful grateful to Dr.Keerthi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr Mallikarjuna is one of the best doctor I have met so far..he is very friendly..he explains everything in details ..give more time to patience to understand their problem and keep them positive always..I would definitely recommend him to my friends n family members.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is the best person and practical ,his protocol before he takes any treatment is always making sure the person whom he is treating is best he can give to them . His confidence gives the treated person a hope to believe that there is always light of Ray even in the darkness

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review:
Visited many famous hospitals in Bangalore but I was not satisfied with the counselling I received from many doctors. They all were pushing  me to undergo various unnecessary treatments.
After meeting Dr. Keerthi BM in Rangadore Memorial, I decided to select him as my gynecologist for a safe delivery.
I'm blessed with a baby girl and I'm very happy to recommend him ** *** **** ************ ** **********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
** ** ******** *** ****** ** *** **** ****** **** ** *** **** we were undergoing lot of stress and problems without children for 7 years. He was the one who gave us that positive thinking which was very successful. With constant consultation and treatment that was provided by Dr. Kirthi, I am very happy that we were blessed with TWINS in the year  2015. From bottom of our hearts we thank Dr. Kirthi for making impossible to possible. I would suggest and request if anyone is facing any Gynac problems then to meet Dr. Kirthi. Once you meet him then you won't regret.
Thank you

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Almost a year back me and my wife consulted the  Dr.Kirthi Mallikarjun .B Sir, with the suggestion by my close friend . After our 6 years marriage , we wanted a baby , we already consulted so many doctors in previous years. But there was no positive result for us. So we consulted Dr. Kirthi Sir and they gave hope for baby and rebuilt our confidence level. Now my wife is 5 months conceive and we are very happy, because of Dr . Kirthi sir. We are glad to met our Doctor . 

This Doctor is very humble , supportive and they interacting with us in any time with smiling face and no words to express our feelings and happiness about his treatment and attitude.We thank god to met such a wonderful person as Dr.Kirthi Mallikarjun B

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Personal care and doubts are easily cleared from the base. Even if he is busy in abroad he will be there with us at any point of time. His friendly behaviour made my pregnancy go smoother than expected. 

I had 3 miscarriages, most of the doctors suggested for iui, but he said iui is not needed for me at all. Let's wait for the natural conception and make it happen. And it really happened. His support made me and husband release From the depression . 

I suggest other women to consult him for any pregnancy related problem happily. You will find right solution for the problem if any.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr kirti is really good and an amazing person....
After speaking to him our doubts were all clear...

review: Very much happy with his hands on expertise related to IVF/ET. Very friendly and Dedicated to his work. Very Very Good and supportive.. His greatest thing He never minds whatever time we call him.. He answers and gives us solutions to our problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: ** ** ** **** ****** ** ****** ****So friendly n soft .he is ready always to help at anytime inneed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We are glad to have met Dr Kirti, his approach in dealing with our problem was very comforting yet practical. He is very friendly and professional. He took us through the whole process of IVF without much stress. 
His vast experience in the field and application of his knowledge to solve complex clinical problem helped us achieve our goal smoothly.
I would strongly recommend him for any Obstetric, infertility and gynecological issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Very friendly doctor..even though there are problems he makes you feel everything is ok,take it easy!..this attitude itself make the patient get through tough times...
Very patient,explains all queries with patience and in positive way
Anytime available over call or msgs.!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor gives more mental support & confidence, which according to me is most important before even starting the treatment. During the treatment takes personal responsibility and is always available for response for queries. Overall it our pleasure to meet and take treatment from Dr.Kirthi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: More than a professional doctor, he is a nice human being. Most of the time he was in UK, when my wife was under treatment, still he extended his guidance and medication through WhatsApp or calls. The care, he takes towards his patients, and the moral support, will make him stand unique among others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very practical, down to earth doctor, gives a very patient hearing and explains each and every aspect of the treatment. Discusses the pros and cons by involving  us and makes us understand the modalities of treatment. I would recommend him to everyone I know.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
